ModMetaData.name: Biomes! Caveworld Flora Unleashed
ModMetaData.author: Rikiki, Mlie, Fluffysminion
ModMetaData.description:
Nature returns to the Rim red in tooth and claw; adding a variety of lifeforms that bring both new challenges and new rewards. With a focus on survival and biological solutions to biological problems, these mods are particularly well suited to lower tech runs, but should also help make the environment more relevant in higher tech colonies as well.
This mod adds a whole host of fungi to caves, which can provide food, medicine, beauty... or they might just be trying to kill you.
Caveworld Flora Unleashed is an update of an update of Rikikis mod, the earlier iterations can be found here: Original: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=755226916 1.1/1.2 Update: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2259058735
